SELECT PSS.WSS_SEQ AS SEQ, PSS.WSS_RESERV_CODE AS RESERV_CODE, PSS.WSS_REG_DT AS REG_DT, '부대시설' AS TYPE, PS.WS_NAME AS NAME, PSS.WSS_APPROVAL AS APPROVAL, '' AS STEP, PSS.WSS_ST_DAY AS ST_DT, PSS.WSS_ED_DAY AS ED_DT, PSS.WSS_MEMO AS REASON FROM PG_SHOP_SCHDULE PSS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_SHOP PS ON PSS.WS_CODE = PS.WS_CODE WHERE PSS.WSS_REG_USER = #{regUser}
AND WSS_APPROVAL in ('C', 'R')
AND WSS_APPROVAL = #{sApproval}
AND WSS_APPROVAL in ('C', 'R', 'D')
AND ( PSS.WSS_ST_DAY BETWEEN #{stDate} AND #{edDate} OR PSS.WSS_ED_DAY BETWEEN #{stDate} AND #{edDate} OR (PSS.WSS_ST_DAY <= #{stDate} AND PSS.WSS_ED_DAY >= #{edDate} ) )
GROUP BY PSS.WSS_RESERV_CODE UNION ALL SELECT PTS.TC_SEQ AS SEQ, PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE AS RESERV_CODE, PTS.TC_REG_DT AS REG_DT, CASE PTR.TR_TRACK_TYPE WHEN 'TYP00' THEN "공동" WHEN 'TYP01' THEN "단독" END AS TYPE, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT TR_TRACK_NAME separator '</br>') AS NAME, PTS.TC_APPROVAL AS APPROVAL, PTS.TC_STEP AS STEP, PTS.TC_DAY AS ST_DT, PTS.TC_DAY2 AS ED_DT, PTS.TC_MEMO AS REASON FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_TRACK_RESERV PTR ON PTS.TC_SEQ=PTR.TC_SEQ WHERE PTS.TC_REG_USER = #{regUser}
AND (PTS.TC_STEP in ('00002', '00003') and PTS.TC_APPROVAL = #{tApproval})
AND (PTS.TC_APPROVAL IN ('1', '2'))
AND ( (PTS.TC_STEP in ('00002', '00003') and PTS.TC_APPROVAL = '3') OR PTS.TC_APPROVAL IN ('1', '2') )
AND ( PTS.TC_DAY BETWEEN #{stDate} AND #{edDate} OR PTS.TC_DAY2 BETWEEN #{stDate} AND #{edDate} OR (PTS.TC_DAY <= #{stDate} AND PTS.TC_DAY2 >= #{edDate} ) )
GROUP BY PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE

SELECT WS_CODE, WS_NAME, WS_PRICE FROM PG_SHOP WHERE WS_DEL_YN != 'Y'
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (order by T_ID asc) as num, T_NAME, T_NICKNAME, T_PRICE, T_PRICE_ADD, T_SOLO FROM PG_TRACK WHERE T_DEL_YN != 'Y' AND T_ID = 'T000'
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (order by T_ID asc) as num, T_NAME, T_NICKNAME, T_PRICE, T_PRICE_ADD, T_SOLO FROM PG_TRACK WHERE T_DEL_YN != 'Y' AND T_ID != 'T000'

SELECT PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE AS RESERVCODE, PTS.TC_REG_DT AS REG_DT, CASE PTR.TR_TRACK_TYPE WHEN 'TYP00' THEN "공동" WHEN 'TYP01' THEN "단독" END AS TYPE, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT TR_TRACK_NAME separator '</br>') AS NAME, PTS.TC_APPROVAL AS APPROVAL, PTS.TC_STEP AS STEP, PTS.TC_DAY AS ST_DT, PTS.TC_DAY2 AS ED_DT, PTS.TC_MEMO AS REASON, PTS.TC_PURPOSE AS PURPOSE, COUNT(DISTINCT PTR.TC_DAY) AS REALDATE, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT PTR.TC_DAY ORDER BY PTR.TC_DAY separator ',') WSS_RESERV_DAY, PTS.COMP_CODE, PC.COMP_NAME, PC.BLACK_LIST, PC.COMP_LICENSE, PM.MEM_NAME, PM.MEM_DEPT, PM.MEM_PHONE, PM.MEM_COMP_PHONE, PM.MEM_EMAIL, PC.COMP_ACCT_NAME, PC.COMP_ACCT_DEPT, PC.COMP_ACCT_EMAIL, PC.COMP_ACCT_PHONE FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_TRACK_RESERV PTR on PTS.TC_SEQ = PTR.TC_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_COMPANY PC on PTS.COMP_CODE = PC.COMP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_MEMBER PM on PTS.TC_REG_USER = PM.MEM_ID WHERE TC_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode}

SELECT PSS.WSS_SEQ AS SEQ, PSS.WSS_RESERV_CODE AS RESERV_CODE, LEFT(PSS.WSS_REG_DT, 8) AS REG_DT, '부대시설' AS TYPE, PS.WS_CODE, PS.WS_NAME AS NAME, PSS.WSS_APPROVAL AS APPROVAL, '' AS STEP, PSS.WSS_ST_DAY AS ST_DT, PSS.WSS_ED_DAY AS ED_DT, PSS.WSS_MEMO AS REASON, PSS.WSS_RESERV_DAY, PSS.COMP_CODE, PC.COMP_NAME, PC.BLACK_LIST, PC.COMP_LICENSE, PM.MEM_NAME, PM.MEM_DEPT, PM.MEM_PHONE, PM.MEM_COMP_PHONE, PM.MEM_EMAIL, PC.COMP_ACCT_NAME, PC.COMP_ACCT_DEPT, PC.COMP_ACCT_EMAIL, PC.COMP_ACCT_PHONE, ABS(DATEDIFF(PSS.WSS_ED_DAY, PSS.WSS_ST_DAY))+1 AS DIFF FROM PG_SHOP_SCHDULE PSS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_COMPANY PC on PSS.COMP_CODE = PC.COMP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_SHOP PS on PSS.WS_CODE = PS.WS_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_MEMBER PM on PSS.WSS_REG_USER = PM.MEM_ID WHERE WSS_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode}

SELECT PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE, PRM.D_SEQ, PRM.D_NAME, PD.D_LEVEL FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM on PTS.TC_SEQ = PRM.TC_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_DRIVER PD on PRM.D_SEQ = PD.D_SEQ WHERE PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode} AND PRM.D_SEQ IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PRM.D_SEQ, PRM.D_NAME

SELECT PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE, PRM.C_CODE, PC.C_NAME, PC.C_COLOR, PC.C_NUMBER FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM on PTS.TC_SEQ = PRM.TC_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_CAR PC on PRM.C_CODE = PC.C_CODE WHERE PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode} AND PRM.C_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PC.C_NUMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE PG_TEST_SCHDULE SET TC_APPROVAL = '2', TC_MOD_USER = #{regUser}, TC_MOD_DT = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE TC_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode}
UPDATE PG_SHOP_SCHDULE SET WSS_APPROVAL = 'C', WSS_MOD_USER = #{regUser}, WSS_MOD_DT = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE WSS_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode}
mapper.select: SELECT PT.T_ID, PT.T_PRICE AS P_PRODUCT_PAY, PTR.TR_TRACK_TYPE, COUNT(DISTINCT PTR.TC_DAY) AS REAL_DATE FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_TRACK_RESERV PTR on PTS.TC_SEQ = PTR.TC_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_TRACK PT on PTR.TR_TRACK_CODE = PT.T_ID WHERE TC_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode} GROUP BY PTR.TR_TRACK_NAME ORDER BY PT.T_PRICE DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT WS_CODE AS T_ID, WS_PRICE AS P_PRODUCT_PAY, WSS_RESERV_DAY FROM ( SELECT PSS.WS_CODE, PSS.WS_PRICE, PSS.WSS_RESERV_DAY FROM PG_SHOP_SCHDULE PSS WHERE WSS_RESERV_CODE = #{reservCode} ) Q
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PG_WEEK_DAY WHERE WD_KIND = #{wsCode} AND #{chkDt} BETWEEN WD_ST_DT AND WD_ED_DT
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PG_DAY_OFF WHERE #{chkDt} BETWEEN DO_ST_DAY AND DO_ED_DAY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PG_SHOP_SCHDULE WHERE WS_CODE = #{wsCode} AND #{chkDt} BETWEEN WSS_ST_DAY AND WSS_ED_DAY AND WSS_APPROVAL not in ('C', 'R')
